name: Shot Supreme
description:
Shot Supreme is an arcade basketball game inspired by incremental games. Like a clicker, but you have to score baskets.

Score Points

Sink baskets to score points

Complete Missions

Earn upgrade points by completing goals

Buy Upgrades

Use your points to upgrade your abilities

Unlock Special Balls

Unlock special balls to earn even more points

Rinse and Repeat

Complete every goal and max out all your abilities to earn a huge score!
